sentences.en: a wildlife film narrated by David Attenborough
sentences.cn: 一部由大卫•艾登堡解说的野生动物影片

sentences.en: Anthropological narrative is a research method, which mainly narrate tales.
sentences.cn: 摘要人类学叙事研究即以叙述故事为主要形式的一种人类学研究方法.

sentences.en: Around the campfire they would narrate tale after tale.
sentences.cn: 他们围坐在营火旁说故事.

sentences.en: Behind it is the narrate gap between prophase modernity and anaphase modernity.
sentences.cn: 其背后正是前期现代性遭遇后期现代性所产生的叙事裂隙.

sentences.en: Consumer have three emotion hierarchy: sensibility, significance and narrate in packing container.
sentences.cn: 消费者对包装容器的情感体验存在于三个层次, 即 感性层 、 表意层和叙述层.

sentences.en: He tried his best to narrate and act on the stories he read before.
sentences.cn: 他努力把读过的那个故事连说带比地讲出来.

sentences.en: Many of London's streets help narrate British history.
sentences.cn: 许多伦敦的街道都在讲述着大不列颠的历史.

sentences.en: Narrate the function and process of mobile MISC system.
sentences.cn: 介绍移动MISC系统的功能和作用.

sentences.en: Richard is going to narrate in the new radio play.
sentences.cn: 理查将在这个新的广播剧中担任旁白.

sentences.en: Shall I narrate a strange experience of mine?
sentences.cn: 我把我的一次奇遇叙述一下好 吗 ?

sentences.en: The dreams are so idiotic that I can hardly bring myself to narrate them.
sentences.cn: 这些梦非常无聊,我简直不大好意思讲.

sentences.en: The main character narrates the story.
The three of them narrate the same events from three perspectives.
sentences.cn: 他们三人从三个不同的视角讲述了同样的事件。

sentences.en: These disparate feelings narrate a paragraph of dramatic aesthetic history.
sentences.cn: 这些迥异的感觉便叙说了一段生动的审美变迁史.

sentences.en: They each narrate their own tale but are all inextricably linked together.
sentences.cn: 她们各自讲述自己的故事,却又不可避免地联系在一起.

sentences.en: To narrate or coordinate ( a newscast ).
sentences.cn: 主持叙述或协调 ( 新闻广播节目 )

sentences.en: Try to narrate and analysis the cause, mechanism and the main clinical manifestation of cold syndrome.
sentences.cn: 试述寒证的病因 、 病机及主要临床表现,并加以分析.

words.tran_cn: 叙事的，叙述的；叙事体的

trans.tran_en: to tell a story by describing all the events in order, for example in a book

trans.tran_cn: 讲，谈到，叙述，做旁白说明，讲故事
